version_description:
· Expanded support for Arabic language in conversation mode
· Added support for Klingon language
· Bug fixes

· Expanded support for Arabic language in conversation mode
· Added support for Klingon language
· Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes

- 下载语言包以获得支持40多种语言，包括阿拉伯语、汉语、西班牙语、葡萄牙语、日语和韩语的离线翻译功能。
- 在 Safari 设置中打开我们的 Safari 拓展程序，您就可以用它在网页中翻译文本了。

- 下载语言包以获得支持40多种语言，包括阿拉伯语、汉语、西班牙语、葡萄牙语、日语和韩语的离线翻译功能。
- 在 Safari 设置中打开我们的 Safari 拓展程序，您就可以用它在网页中翻译文本了。
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes

New option in Settings to change the voice that reads out translation results.

See alternative translations of single words. Available in 100 language pairs.

Tap on the book icon at the bottom of the home screen to quickly access key phrases in 50+ languages. You have the option to favorite, listen to, share, and edit the phrases.

Bug fixes

New option in Settings to change the voice that reads out translation results.
See alternative translations of single words. Available in 100 language pairs.

Tap on the book icon at the bottom of the home screen to quickly access key phrases in 50+ languages. You have the option to favorite, listen to, share, and edit the phrases.

Bug fixes

• New group conversation feature that enables users to real-time translated conversations with two or more people by connecting their devices
• New two-person speech mode that enables two people to have a conversation using the same device
• Bug fixes
Several bug fixes and usability improvements

- Chinese offline translation fix
- Faster app startup and performance improvements
- Device locale language fixes
- Redundant history entries fix
- Conversation feature disconnection fix
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

- Japanese and Hindi transliteration support
- Filipino available for offline text translation
- Scrolling for longer translations UI fix
- Safari extension language selection fix
- Phrasebook UI bug fix
- Accessibility fixes for ease of use with screen readers and keyboard navigation
- Updating authentication mechanisms
- Other bug fixes

- Performance improvements for faster startup time
- Language fixes resulting in more reliable offline pack downloads and behavior
- Debug logs and telemetry for better reporting

• Added a setting to turn off profanity filter
• Added feature to show language detected in the format “English (Detected)” and let user swap “to” and “from” language
• Updated offline behaviour to make it more intuitive to download and use offline packs for supported languages
• Added action buttons in text mode while keyboard is up to let user take action on the translation like sharing and pinning
• Fixed language scrolling behaviour for longer strings
• Added prompt for app review after frequent usage
• Updated animation to respond to user input in speech mode
• Added in-app experience to let users create new bugs or vote for existing features inside the app

- Slower speeds for translation audio-out
- Extension to translate text copied from different apps
- Extension to translate images copied from different apps
- Additional "emergency" category in Phrasebook
- Improved handling of longer strings
- Bug fixes

- Slower speeds for translation audio-out
- Extension to translate text copied from different apps
- Extension to translate images copied from different apps
- Additional "emergency" category in Phrasebook
- Improved handling of longer strings
- Bug fixes
iPhone X Support

- Recall previous build because of Japanese and Chinese input bugs.
- Slower speeds for translation audio-out
- Extension to translate text copied from different apps
- Extension to translate images copied from different apps
- Additional "emergency" category in Phrasebook
- Improved handling of longer strings
- Bug fixes

- Improved speech translation experiences
- Bug fixes
iPhone X Support

Bug Fixes
Improved Support for offline language packs

Improvements for transliteration

Improved analytics and crash reporting
Bug fixes and general improvements

Improvements for accessibility
Improvements for conversation feature
Improved layout for settings pages
Bug fixes and general improvements

•Revised behavior for profanity filter: now, only profanities recognized in speech will be filtered
•Improvement for crash reporting
•Improvement for image translation, especially large texts
•Revised default language settings
•Other bug fixes and crash fixes

- Significantly improved support for "Apple Watch"
- Improved interaction with microphone button in the Conversations feature
- Revised permissions requests, including removing request for geolocation
- Improved copy text option for image translation
- General bug fixes and improvements

Improvements for offline language packs
Bug fixes and general improvements

Modified sharing a conversation code: it will now send a link to open in browser
Refreshed icons for phrasebook, translation history and settings
Added a close button in phrasebook
Fixed display bug where status bar is unreadable on the settings page
Fixed issues for updating offline language packs

Improvements for accessibility 
Improvements for translation history 
Bug fixes and general improvements 
Layout improvements for translating long texts

Improvements for visual accessibility: additional labeling, localization and support for screenreader
Improved support for landscape mode in the conversation feature, translation history, phrasebook, and settings
Resolved bug for language selection on larger sizes of the Apple Watch

Bug fixes for image translation
Improvements for visual accessibility: support for large text on settings screen, navigation for Conversations, and support for rotor control types

Resolved layout bug on Settings page
Resolved bug with translation history
Layout improvements for translating long texts
Fixed issue of frequent prompts for microphone permissions and privacy page
Fixed bug where recent languages were not shown in order of last used
Fixed crashing issue for image translation when in landscape view
